creator: thomas.jacob@sinnerschrader.com
text:
The attribute "zipfile" in task zip is documented to be named "destfile". This is wrong, 
"zipfile" works.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
destfile works too :) we unified all the names of the output files of zip, jar,
war, ear, etc, to all be destfile, but left the existing stuff in there because
breaking any existing build is a no-no.
